name: Archeologist's apology
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 61: Ancient Egypt.

You as an archeologist enter the pyramid for search for some ancient stuff. Suddenly mummys appear and they seem angry. What to do now..? You can't hurt them...            Oh you know! Apologize! 

Controls:
movement- w, a, s, d
'shooting'- mouse L-click
fullscreen- f

Game made in Python with Pygame.
